summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department; declaring as surplus and authorizing the release of two (2) electrical distribution easements over portions of Lots 30 and 31, Block 433, Plat of Seattle Tide Lands and over Lot 52, Block 13, Allentown (P.M. Nos. 240312-3- 003 and 230411-3-002 respectively).
